channel.title: [delta]Please help with exp rate problem[delta]
channel.description:
Hello, i have searched and search normally i dont come for help but i have forgotten the code for exp rate for delta base. i know for other bases but forget delta. i foyu could tell me code t would be greatly apprctiated.
also if anyone know how to add a scoreboard to delta not needed but would rep and gratly appreciated if you explained. ive searched but no luck.
thanks, Buddy

item.title: [delta]Please help with exp rate problem[delta]
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

Player.java
Search for:

public int CombatExpRate = 10;

Change the 10 to whatever, but 5-10 is the best becasue there wonâ€™t be many pures or zerkers on your server then ;D
